blocks.text: The easiest way to install, directly on metal, is through NPM. The following operating systems are supported.

orderList.code:
sudo apt update
sudo apt install curl gnupg2 -y
curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | sudo -E bash -
sudo apt install nodejs -y
sudo apt install npm -y

orderList.text: CentOS / RHEL - Download and Install Node.js, NPM.
orderList.code:
sudo yum update
sudo yum install curl -y
curl --silent --location https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | bash -
sudo yum install nodejs npm -y

mkdir Shinobi
cd Shinobi
sudo npm install shinobi
mv node_modules/shinobi/* .
sudo npm start

orderList.text: You will be asked a series of questions throughout the installation.

blocks.text: Docker is not officially supported and is not recommended. The kitematic method is provided for those who wish to quickly test Shinobi. The Docker files included in the master and dev branches are maintained by the community. If you would like support with Docker please find a community member who maintains the Docker files or please refer to Docker's forum.

orderList.text: Search for Shinobi on Kitematic and click ... Then select the tag kitematic. Then click Create.
Once completed you should see a window like this.
Click the Settings tab on the right then click Ports just below it.
Click the Web Address with 8083 next to it. You will be presented with a login screen. The default credentials are as follows.
Updating : Restart the shinobi docker instance to update the following files and folders. They will be overwritten.

list.code:
- camera.js
- cron.js
- plugins/motion/shinobi-motion.js
- plugins/opencv/shinobi-opencv.js
- UPDATE.sh
- web/

orderList.text: Packages will be installed. MariaDB will ask to create a password on first installation.
Once complete. Open up http://localhost:8080 in your browser.

list.text: Note : if you are installed on a remote computer open up the IP in your web browser.

orderList.text: Default credentials are as follows if you chose to install default_data.sql.
To update Shinobi with git and restart :
orderList.code:
cd Shinobi
git pull
pm2 restart camera.js
pm2 restart cron.js
